title: Installation issue: trilinos <= 12.10.1 fails cmake phase
body:
I'm having difficulty building older versions of Trilinos due to a cmake configuration error (see output below).  To reproduce simply leave the default variants and specify downrev versions.  @aprokop, @keitat would you mind commenting about this as well?

---

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install trilinos@12.10.1
$ spack install trilinos@12.8.1
$ spack install trilinos@12.6.4    # etc.
==> Checking dependencies for trilinos@12.x.y for x <= 10
.
.
.
1 error found in build log:
     99     -- Setting Trilinos_ENABLE_PanzerDofMgr=OFF because PanzerDofMgr ha
            s a required library dependence on disabled package Shards
     100    -- Setting ML_ENABLE_Isorropia=OFF because ML has an optional libra
            ry dependence on disabled package Isorropia
     101    -- Setting MueLu_ENABLE_Isorropia=OFF because MueLu has an optional
             library dependence on disabled package Isorropia
     102    -- Setting Ifpack2_ENABLE_ShyLUHTS=OFF because Ifpack2 has an optio
            nal library dependence on disabled package ShyLUHTS
     103    -- Setting Amesos2_ENABLE_ShyLUBasker=OFF because Amesos2 has an op
            tional library dependence on disabled package ShyLUBasker
     104    -- Setting Ifpack2_ENABLE_ShyLUBasker=OFF because Ifpack2 has an op
            tional library dependence on disabled package ShyLUBasker
  >> 105    CMake Error at cmake/tribits/core/package_arch/TribitsAdjustPackage
            Enables.cmake:1087 (MESSAGE):
     106       ***
     107       *** ERROR: Setting Trilinos_ENABLE_SEACAS=OFF which was 'ON' bec
            ause SEACAS has a required library dependence on disabled package S
            EACASChaco!
     108       ***
     109    
     110    Call Stack (most recent call first):
     111      cmake/tribits/core/package_arch/TribitsAdjustPackageEnables.cmake
            :1169 (TRIBITS_PRIVATE_PRINT_DISABLE)

```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux lap-fey.lanl.gov 3.10.0-957.10.1.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Mon Mar 18 15:06:45 UTC 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:    CentOS Linux release 7.6.1810 (Core)
```
